name: Scavenger Hunt－Hidden objects!
description:
Are you looking for fun and useful ways to engage your time?

Scavenger Hunt is a hilarious mobile game that puts players on a virtual scavenger hunt to find hidden objects in the most ridiculous locations imaginable. The game combines elements of puzzle-solving and brain games with the absurdity of a treasure hunt, providing players with a unique and amusing gaming experience.

One of the standout features of Scavenger Hunt is the ability to create and customize your own scavenger hunts. Players can choose the locations, the objects to be found, and the clues and hints to be provided, allowing for a unique and personalized scavenger hunt experience. This customization feature is one of the reasons why Scavenger Hunt has become such a popular mobile game, as it offers players the ability to create their own scavenger hunt adventures that are tailored to their interests and preferences.

Visit the cute fictional town where life is in full swing! In this game, all you need to do is seek the hidden objects on a huge colorful map. However, some items are located in unexpected places. Will you find the hidden objects? Spot it!

Each new level reveals another part of the map. To find out what the whole city looks like, you need to complete all the levels. It’s quite a challenge! If something is well-hidden, the best way to find it is to search carefully, with no rush. When you seek the hidden objects, it improves your attentiveness and observation skills. You can explore a location for an hour and still fail to notice a small item you need. Just stay focused and sooner or later you’ll find it! Are your eyes sharp enough? Download the game now and enjoy playing it every day!

If you like to find the hidden objects, this new free game is something you will really enjoy. The thing that makes it so satisfying is the fact that the characters are always on the move. In the game, you’ll see a panel with a list of various objects from a butterfly to a hamburger, and your goal is to find out where they’re located. Explore the map and zoom in on specific areas to find it. The faster you find the hidden objects, the faster you’ll unlock new maps. Each map is a whole new world dedicated to a certain theme – endless fun! Spot it!

An item can be everywhere – on a rooftop, in someone's pool, or under the feet of a green-haired baseball player – waiting for you to find it. It’s way more entertaining than other games where you need to seek the hidden objects yet not too difficult.

If you've played Hidden Objects games before, you'll love this next level edition. What makes it so special? Let’s find out! Spot it!

- Fun TO PLAY! Find the hidden objects anytime and anywhere on your device.
- INTUITIVE GAMEPLAY. Seek the hidden objects on the map and tap on them once found. Can’t see an item? Use a hint and find out where the thing you’re looking for is.
- NO TIME LIMIT. Feel free to seek the hidden objects for as long as you need!
- BEAUTIFUL MAPS. Bright colors and little details will make you fall in love with the map. You haven’t seen anything like this in other games!
- HOURS OF JOY. Each map is enormous and we constantly add new ones, so the game guarantees you hours of a meditative yet fun experience. Other games will seem boring once you try this one.

Find out what you’re capable of and explore the most addictive game you’ve ever played! Overall, Scavenger Hunt is a fantastic mobile game that offers endless hours of entertainment and laughter for players. With its unique combination of scavenger hunting, puzzle-solving, and brain games, Scavenger Hunt is sure to keep players engaged and entertained. So why not download the game today and start your own hilarious scavenger hunt adventure? Spot it!
